item.description:
Even though its now November let's continue to meetup at Jacob Wirth for an Okoberfest Happy Hour to raise a few steins and check out the trivia doled out by Morgan J. White, Jr.

Morgan is the undisputed Master of the Trivia Universe. After 25 years he continues to amaze folks with his one-of-a kind trivia show at which you provide categories and he uses his mind-boggling breadth of knowledge to create questions on the spot for your chance at prizes. Along with being smart, Morgan is personable and exudes a geeky coolness.

Jacob Wirth is one of Boston's oldest restaurants and provides the closest approximation of a lively Bavarian bier garten with a great and varied beer selection as well as large communal tables.

Trivia begins at 5:30 PM and ends at 7:00 PM.

Get there when you can and stay as long as you're able.

If this will be your first time meeting the Happy Hour Crew, check out the photos of those who RSVPd Yes so you can find the group.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

MBTA:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route five (5) minute walk from Green Line Boylston subway stop or Orange Line Tufts Medical subway stop.
item.name: Oktoberfest Happy Hour on Election Eve
